CustomField.description:
Total count of legacy u accounts from related account records. This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Count_of_Legacy_U_Accounts__c.
Criteria for legacy u is legacy system cd does not contain x, account record type = customer.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total count of all related legacy u accounts.
CustomField.label: Legacy U Accounts
